      • login

        public static int login​(int id,
                        java.lang.String password)
        gets id and password and checks if the user exists
        Parameters:
        id - id
        password - password
        Returns:
        1 if the user is customer, 0 if the user is trader, -1 when the user is not found or password is not matching
